Dwyane Wade

Dwyane Tyrone Wade Jr.

(D-Wade, Flash, WOW, Pookie, Father Prime)

Position: Shooting Guard and Point Guard ▪ Shoots: Right

6-4, 220lb (193cm, 99kg)

Born: January 17, 1982 in Chicago, Illinois us

College: Marquette

High School: Richards in Oak Lawn, Illinois

Draft: Miami Heat, 1st round (5th pick, 5th overall), 2003 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: October 28, 2003

Hall of Fame: Inducted as Player in 2023 (Full List)

Career Length: 16 years

  • Hall of Fame
  • 13x All Star
  • 2008-09 Scoring Champ
  • 3x NBA Champ
  • 8x All-NBA
  • 2003-04 All-Rookie
  • 3x All-Defensive
  • 2005-06 Finals MVP
  • 2009-10 AS MVP
  • NBA 75th Anniv. Team

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Dwyane Wade?

Dwyane Wade is 43 years old.

Where was Dwyane Wade born?

Dwyane Wade was born in Chicago, Illinois.

When was Dwyane Wade born?

Dwyane Wade was born on January 17, 1982.

How tall is Dwyane Wade?

Dwyane Wade is 6-4 (193 cm) tall.

How much did Dwyane Wade weigh when playing?

Dwyane Wade weighed 220 lbs (99 kg) when playing.

Is Dwyane Wade in the Hall of Fame?

Dwyane Wade was inducted to the Hall of Fame as a Player in 2023 (Full List) .

When was Dwyane Wade drafted?

Dwyane Wade was drafted by Miami Heat, 1st round (5th pick, 5th overall), 2003 NBA Draft.

What position did Dwyane Wade play?

Shooting Guard and Point Guard.

When did Dwyane Wade retire?

Dwyane Wade last played in 2019.

What is Dwyane Wade's net worth?

Dwyane Wade made at least $198,936,935 playing professional basketball.

How much did Dwyane Wade make?

Dwyane Wade made $23,200,000 in 2017.

What did Dwyane Wade average?

Dwyane Wade averaged 22.0 points, 4.7 rebounds, and 5.4 assists per game.

How many rings does Dwyane Wade have?

Dwyane Wade won 3 championships.

What is Dwyane Wade's Twitter account?

Dwyane Wade is on Twitter at DwyaneWade.

What schools did Dwyane Wade attend?

Dwyane Wade attended Richards in Oak Lawn, Illinois and Marquette.

What are Dwyane Wade's nicknames?

D-Wade, Flash, WOW, Pookie, Father Prime are nicknames for Dwyane Wade.
